text: Charlie the Unicorn is a 2005 animated comedy short film created by Jason Steele of independent film company FilmCow in Orlando, Florida. The short follows Charlie, a lethargic and pessimistic unicorn, who is taken by a blue unicorn and a pink unicorn on an adventure to the magical wonders. Though the two unicorns usually end up harming Charlie or taking his belongings.
title: Charlie the Unicorn
